definition[0]: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
definition[1]: behaviour or actions that are cunning are clever but dishonest and unfair, and are used to get what you want
definition[2]: a cunning object or piece of equipment is clever and unusual
example[2]: a cunning little device for keeping out draughts
definition[3]: the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way
example[5]: She would use low cunning  (=unpleasant dishonest methods) to win people’s sympathy.
